sect2.title: 内容
sect2.para: PPP 包括 the chat, pppd, pppdump and pppstats programs.

sect3.title: chat
sect3.para: chat program defines a conversational exchange between the computer 和 the modem. Its primary purpose is to establish the connection between the Point-to-Point Protocol Daemon (PPPD) 和 the remote's pppd process.

sect3.title: pppd
sect3.para: pppd is the Point to Point Protocol daemon.

sect3.title: pppdump
sect3.para: pppdump is used to convert PPP record files to a readable format.

sect3.title: pppstats
sect3.para: pppstats is used to print PPP statistics.
